name: Caldwell - Anastasia Yellow - Opera
additionalNotes: Caldwell's renowned Anastasia cigar debuted in 2016 as a limited-edition release before returning in 2018 with a slightly tweaked, regular-production blend â€” though still kept secret. It's since become among Caldwell's most sought-after cigars, and 2022 welcomed this limited-edition Yellow Label 2022 version. Though its components remain a closely guarded secret, the Anastasia Yellow Label 2022 cigar features a Habano wrapper and is hand-rolled at an undisclosed Dominican factory.
